ovdesc.p: The purpose of this table is to configure information that is used in TPS process.

desc.p: 1. RESET.METHODS.ID - the record with this ID will contain all the methods that are used by SOD and EOD to activate and de-active static data.
2. TPS.TABLES.ID - the record with this ID will contain all the TPS tables names that should be imported in INSIGHT application.
3. SODEOD.MANDATORY.JOBS - the record with this ID will contain all the SOD and EOD jobs that are mandatory to be run.
Indicates the names of the routines that should be invoked, the jobs that should be skipped/run, the names of the services that should be started/stopped, etc.
This is a multivalue field and each value will have 60 alphanumeric characters.
